ground_truth: Hermione and Ron go downstairs as Luna follows Harry. In the courtyard, she faces the school where massive stone statues of warriors wielding huge weapons land on the paved terrace by the main entrance. The stone warriors march down steps to the courtyard, as Professor Flitwick strides across the cobbled courtyard and points his wand in the air, joined by Professor Slughorn and Molly. Students stand beside them, staring up into the sky as flashes of light flow from the wands, causing clouds to join together. A Dementor flies past and is repelled by the ever-increasing mass that extends to cover the school and the grounds, forming a protective shield. Inside, Harry continues making his way up a spiral staircase against the tide of students, with Luna catching up to him. He stops and turns, spotting something outside a window. Moving towards it, he gazes out at the glowing protective shields as they slowly descend, and side by side, they stare at the shield. Flitwick is outside, watching the shield ascend, as Luna and Harry stand framed between torches. His shadow cast against a wall, Harry continues along a dark corridor, the only light coming from a tall window on his right, as he nears a stone doorway. Harry sees a ghostly dark-haired woman in a gray dress hovering by a window, who turns to him, becomes a ball of light, and passes through Harry. The ghostly woman stops with a somber and anxious face. Outside, the night is almost pitch black, with the lights of Hogwarts glowing dimly in the distance, as an amassed army of Death Eaters stands on a rocky outcrop looking down at the school. They part as Voldemort, followed by Bellatrix, strides through the army to the edge of the cliff and turns to glare at Pius Thicknesse, who backs away. The Death Eaters aim their wands in the air and loose a volley of bolts of light, raining down like shooting stars on the protective shield. Harry looks across at the ghostly Helena as she moves away. He runs around a walkway and leaps onto a low wall. Having confronted Harry, she recedes, floating away from him, out into the walkway. Harry follows her as she stands with her back to him, turns stiffly to face him, studies his careworn face, then moves closer before floating away. Helena transforms into a ball of light and speeds away. Harry races down the spiral staircase where Kingsley Shacklebolt is with Remus Lupin and student Dean Thomas. Shacklebolt stares up as the Death Eaters' bolts strike them, while the Weasley twins, George and Fred, stare up at the sky. Hermione stands behind Ron at a door decorated with six large metal snakes.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Hermione and Ron descend as Luna trails Harry. In the courtyard, she confronts the school where enormous stone figures of fighters wielding gigantic armaments land on the paved terrace by the primary entrance. The stone fighters march down steps to the courtyard, as Professor Flitwick strides across the cobbled courtyard and directs his wand in the air, accompanied by Professor Slughorn and Molly. Pupils stand beside them, gazing up into the sky as bursts of light flow from the wands, causing clouds to combine. A Dementor flies past and is repelled by the ever-growing mass that extends to encompass the school and the grounds, forming a defensive shield. Inside, Harry continues making his way up a spiral staircase against the stream of pupils, with Luna catching up to him. He halts and turns, spotting something outside a window. Moving towards it, he gazes out at the radiant defensive shields as they slowly descend, and side by side, they gaze at the shield. Flitwick is outside, observing the shield ascend, as Luna and Harry stand framed between torches. His shadow cast against a wall, Harry continues along a dark corridor, the only light coming from a tall window on his right, as he approaches a stone doorway. Harry perceives a spectral dark-haired woman in a gray dress hovering by a window, who turns to him, becomes a sphere of light, and passes through Harry. The spectral woman halts with a somber and anxious face. Outside, the night is nearly pitch black, with the lights of Hogwarts glowing faintly in the remoteness, as an assembled army of Death Eaters stands on a rocky prominence gazing down at the school. They part as Voldemort, followed by Bellatrix, strides through the army to the border of the cliff and turns to glare at Pius Thicknesse, who retreats. The Death Eaters direct their wands in the air and release a volley of bolts of light, raining down like shooting stars on the defensive shield. Harry looks across at the spectral Helena as she moves away. He runs around a walkway and leaps onto a low wall. Having confronted Harry, she recedes, floating away from him, out into the pathway. Harry follows her as she stands with her back to him, turns rigidly to face him, studies his careworn face, then moves closer before floating away. Helena transforms into a sphere of light and speeds away. Harry races down the spiral staircase where Kingsley Shacklebolt is with Remus Lupin and pupil Dean Thomas. Shacklebolt stares up as the Death Eaters' bolts strike them, while the Weasley twins, George and Fred, gaze up at the sky. Hermione stands behind Ron at a door adorned with six large metal serpents.

test_cases.description: Hermione and Ron are followed downstairs by Luna as Harry goes. In the courtyard, the school is faced by her where massive stone statues of warriors wielding huge weapons are landed on the paved terrace by the main entrance. The stone warriors are marched down steps to the courtyard as Professor Flitwick strides across the cobbled courtyard and points his wand in the air, joined by Professor Slughorn and Molly. They stand beside students, who stare up into the sky as flashes of light are flowed from the wands, causing clouds to join together. A Dementor flies past and the ever-increasing mass repels it, which extends to cover the school and the grounds, forming a protective shield. Inside, his way is continued by Harry up a spiral staircase against the tide of students, with Luna catching up to him. He stops and turns, spotting something outside a window. Moving towards it, the glowing protective shields are gazed at by him as they slowly descend, and side by side, the shield is stared at by them. Flitwick watches the shield ascend outside, as Luna and Harry stand framed between torches. His shadow is cast against a wall as Harry continues along a dark corridor, the only light coming from a tall window on his right, as a stone doorway is neared by him. A ghostly dark-haired woman in a gray dress is seen by Harry hovering by a window, who turns to him, becomes a ball of light, and passes through him. The ghostly woman stops with a somber and anxious face. Outside, the night is almost pitch black, with the lights of Hogwarts glowing dimly in the distance, as an amassed army of Death Eaters stands on a rocky outcrop looking down at the school. They part as Voldemort, followed by Bellatrix, strides through the army to the edge of the cliff and turns to glare at Pius Thicknesse, who backs away. Their wands are aimed in the air by the Death Eaters and a volley of bolts of light is loosed by them, raining down like shooting stars on the protective shield. The ghostly Helena is looked across at by Harry as she moves away. He runs around a walkway and leaps onto a low wall. Having confronted Harry, she recedes, floating away from him, out into the walkway. She is followed by Harry as she stands with her back to him, turns stiffly to face him, studies his careworn face, then moves closer before floating away. Helena transforms into a ball of light and speeds away. Harry races down the spiral staircase where Kingsley Shacklebolt is with Remus Lupin and student Dean Thomas. Shacklebolt stares up as the Death Eaters' bolts strike them, while the Weasley twins, George and Fred, stare up at the sky. At a door decorated with six large metal snakes, Ron is stood behind by Hermione.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Hermione and Ron head downstairs as Luna follows Harry. In the courtyard, massive stone statues of warriors with huge weapons land on the terrace by the entrance. The stone warriors march to the courtyard, where Professor Flitwick, joined by Professor Slughorn and Molly, points his wand skyward. Students watch as light from the wands causes clouds to merge. A Dementor is repelled by the growing mass, forming a protective shield over the school. Inside, Harry ascends a spiral staircase against the flow of students, with Luna catching up. He stops, noticing something outside a window, and they gaze at the descending protective shields. Flitwick observes the shield rising as Luna and Harry stand framed by torches. Harry continues along a dark corridor, lit only by a tall window, nearing a stone doorway. He sees a ghostly woman in a gray dress, who turns into a ball of light and passes through him, stopping with a somber face. Outside, the night is nearly pitch black, with Hogwarts' lights dim in the distance, as Death Eaters stand on a rocky outcrop. Voldemort, followed by Bellatrix, strides to the cliff's edge, glaring at Pius Thicknesse. The Death Eaters fire bolts of light at the protective shield. Harry watches the ghostly Helena move away, then follows her as she transforms into a ball of light and speeds off. Harry races down the spiral staircase, where Kingsley Shacklebolt is with Remus Lupin and Dean Thomas. Shacklebolt looks up as the Death Eaters' bolts strike, while the Weasley twins, George and Fred, watch the sky. Hermione stands behind Ron at a door with six large metal snakes.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Hermione and Ron descend as Luna follows Harry. In the courtyard, Luna faces the school where stone warrior statues land on the terrace. The warriors march to the courtyard as Professors Flitwick, Slughorn, and Molly join students, casting spells to form a protective shield. A Dementor is repelled by the shield covering the school. Inside, Harry ascends a spiral staircase with Luna. He stops, noticing the glowing shield outside. Flitwick watches the shield ascend as Luna and Harry stand framed by torches. Harry continues along a dark corridor, nearing a stone doorway, and sees a ghostly woman who becomes a light ball and passes through him. Outside, Death Eaters, led by Voldemort and Bellatrix, aim wands at the shield. Harry watches Helena, the ghost, move away. He follows her as she transforms into light and speeds off. Harry races down the staircase to Kingsley Shacklebolt, Remus Lupin, and Dean Thomas. Shacklebolt and the Weasley twins watch the Death Eaters' attack. Hermione stands with Ron at a door with metal snakes.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Hermione and Ron make their way downstairs, with Luna closely following Harry. In the expansive courtyard, Luna turns to face the grand school building, where enormous stone statues of warriors, each wielding impressively large weapons, land with a heavy thud on the paved terrace near the main entrance. These formidable stone warriors begin their march down the steps leading to the courtyard. Meanwhile, Professor Flitwick strides purposefully across the cobbled courtyard, raising his wand high into the air. He is soon joined by Professor Slughorn and Molly, who stand beside him. Together, they point their wands skyward, and students gather around them, their eyes fixed on the sky above. Flashes of light emanate from the wands, causing the clouds to merge and form a protective barrier. A Dementor swoops past but is quickly repelled by the ever-growing mass that extends to envelop the school and its grounds, creating a protective shield. Inside the castle, Harry continues his determined ascent up a spiral staircase, moving against the flow of students, with Luna managing to catch up to him. He pauses and turns, noticing something outside a nearby window. Moving closer, he peers out at the glowing protective shields as they gradually descend. Together, side by side, they gaze at the shield. Outside, Professor Flitwick observes the shield as it ascends, while Luna and Harry stand framed between two torches. Harry's shadow is cast against a wall as he continues along a dimly lit corridor, the only illumination coming from a tall window on his right, as he approaches a stone doorway. There, he sees a ghostly woman with dark hair, dressed in a gray gown, hovering by a window. She turns to him, transforms into a ball of light, and passes through Harry. The ghostly woman halts, her expression somber and anxious. Outside, the night is nearly pitch black, with the faint lights of Hogwarts glowing in the distance. An army of Death Eaters stands amassed on a rocky outcrop, looking down at the school. They part as Voldemort, with Bellatrix following closely behind, strides through the ranks to the edge of the cliff and turns to glare menacingly at Pius Thicknesse, who retreats. The Death Eaters raise their wands to the sky and unleash a volley of bolts of light, which rain down like shooting stars upon the protective shield. Harry glances across at the ghostly Helena as she begins to move away. He dashes around a walkway and leaps onto a low wall. After confronting Harry, she floats away from him, out into the walkway. Harry follows her as she stands with her back to him, then turns stiffly to face him, studying his careworn face. She moves closer before floating away once more. Helena transforms into a ball of light and speeds away. Harry races down the spiral staircase, where he finds Kingsley Shacklebolt with Remus Lupin and student Dean Thomas. Shacklebolt gazes upward as the Death Eaters' bolts strike the shield, while the Weasley twins, George and Fred, also look up at the sky. Hermione stands behind Ron at a door adorned with six large metal snakes.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Hermione and Ron begin their descent down the stairs, with Luna closely following behind Harry in her usual, somewhat ethereal manner. As they make their way into the expansive courtyard, Luna stops momentarily, turning to admire the magnificent, grand structure of the school building. Towering stone statues of warriors, each bearing impressively large weapons, make their presence known as they land with a resounding and heavy thud on the paved terrace near the main entrance. These fearsome and formidable stone warriors proceed to march decisively down the steps that lead to the courtyard. At the same time, Professor Flitwick strides purposefully and with intent across the cobbled courtyard, raising his wand high into the air with a determined look. He is soon joined by Professor Slughorn and Molly, who position themselves beside him, standing in solidarity. Together, they lift their wands skyward, and gradually, students gather around them, their eyes fixed with anticipation and awe as they watch the sky above. Flashes of bright light erupt from their wands, causing the clouds to swirl and merge, forming a protective barrier. A Dementor swiftly swoops past but is quickly driven back by the ever-expanding mass that extends to envelop the entirety of the school and its sprawling grounds, creating a powerful protective shield. Inside the castle, Harry proceeds on his determined ascent up a spiral staircase, moving against the flow of students in a steady, purposeful manner, with Luna managing to catch up to him. He pauses momentarily, turning his attention to something he notices outside a nearby window. Moving closer with curiosity, he peers out at the glowing protective shields as they gradually descend and unfold. Together, side by side, they stand and gaze at the shield's brilliance. Outside, Professor Flitwick observes the shield as it begins to ascend, while Luna and Harry stand framed beautifully between two flickering torches. Harry's elongated shadow is cast against a shadowy wall as he continues his journey along a dimly lit corridor, the solitary illumination coming from a tall window on his right, as he approaches a rustic stone doorway. There, he encounters a ghostly woman with dark, flowing hair, elegantly dressed in a gray gown, hovering by a window with an air of somber mystery. She turns to him with a ghostly grace, transforming silently into a radiant ball of light, and passes gently through Harry. The ghostly woman pauses, her expression etched with somber anxiety. Outside, the night is nearly pitch black, a deep and endless void, with the faint, gentle lights of Hogwarts glowing softly in the distance. An army of Death Eaters stands amassed like a dreadful force on a rocky outcrop, gazing intently down at the school. They part respectfully as Voldemort, with Bellatrix following closely behind him, strides confidently through the ranks to the edge of the cliff and turns to glare menacingly at Pius Thicknesse, who, sensing his displeasure, retreats cautiously. The Death Eaters raise their wands to the sky, unleashing a torrent of bolts of light, which descend upon the protective shield like a rain of shooting stars. Harry glances across at the ghostly Helena as she commences her retreat. He dashes quickly around a walkway and leaps onto a low wall with agility. After their confrontation, she floats away from him, gliding out into the walkway. Harry follows her closely as she stands with her back to him, then turns stiffly to face him, scrutinizing his careworn face with a knowing look. She moves closer, examining him with a penetrating gaze, before floating away once more. Helena then transforms into a luminous ball of light and speeds away into the distance, leaving Harry to his thoughts. Harry races down the spiral staircase with urgency, where he finds Kingsley Shacklebolt alongside Remus Lupin and student Dean Thomas. Shacklebolt looks upward, his gaze fixed, as the Death Eaters' bolts strike the shield with fierce determination, while the Weasley twins, George and Fred, also turn their eyes upward toward the sky. Hermione stands quietly behind Ron at a doorway that is adorned with six large, intricately designed metal snakes.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Hermione and Ron make their way downstairs, each step echoing softly as Luna follows closely behind Harry. In the courtyard, Luna pauses to face the school, her eyes drawn to the massive stone statues of warriors that suddenly animate, their huge weapons clanking as they land heavily on the paved terrace by the main entrance. The stone warriors begin their march, their stone feet thudding rhythmically as they descend the steps to the courtyard. Meanwhile, Professor Flitwick strides purposefully across the cobbled courtyard, his robes swishing with each step, and raises his wand high into the air. He is soon joined by Professor Slughorn and Molly, who stand beside him, their wands also pointed skyward. Students gather around them, their eyes wide with anticipation as they gaze up into the sky. Flashes of light burst forth from the wands, weaving together to form a tapestry of clouds that merge and expand. A Dementor swoops past, its dark form momentarily blotting out the stars, but it is swiftly repelled by the ever-growing mass of light that stretches to envelop the school and its grounds, forming a shimmering protective shield. Inside, Harry navigates his way up a spiral staircase, moving against the tide of students who are descending. Luna, determined to keep up, catches up to him. Harry halts abruptly, his attention caught by something outside a nearby window. He moves towards it, his footsteps echoing softly, and peers out to see the glowing protective shields as they slowly descend, casting an ethereal glow. Standing side by side, Harry and Luna gaze at the shield, their faces illuminated by its light. Outside, Professor Flitwick watches intently as the shield ascends, while Luna and Harry remain framed between the flickering torches. Harry's shadow stretches long against the wall as he continues along a dark corridor, the only illumination coming from a tall window on his right. He approaches a stone doorway and notices a ghostly dark-haired woman in a gray dress hovering by a window. She turns to him, her form shifting into a ball of light that passes through Harry, leaving him momentarily breathless. The ghostly woman halts, her expression somber and anxious. Outside, the night is nearly pitch black, with the distant lights of Hogwarts glowing faintly. An army of Death Eaters stands amassed on a rocky outcrop, their eyes fixed on the school below. They part as Voldemort strides through, Bellatrix trailing closely behind, until he reaches the edge of the cliff and turns to glare at Pius Thicknesse, who instinctively backs away. The Death Eaters raise their wands in unison, releasing a volley of bolts of light that streak through the sky like shooting stars, crashing against the protective shield. Harry glances across at the ghostly Helena as she begins to move away. He quickly runs around a walkway, his footsteps echoing, and leaps onto a low wall. Confronted by Helena, she floats away from him, her form ethereal and distant. Harry follows her, watching as she stands with her back to him, then turns stiffly to face him, her eyes studying his careworn face. She moves closer, her presence both comforting and unsettling, before floating away once more. Helena transforms into a ball of light and speeds away, leaving Harry to race down the spiral staircase. At the base, Kingsley Shacklebolt stands with Remus Lupin and student Dean Thomas, all of them looking up as the Death Eaters' bolts strike the shield. The Weasley twins, George and Fred, also stare up at the sky, their expressions a mix of awe and determination. Hermione stands behind Ron at a door adorned with six large metal snakes, her hand resting lightly on his shoulder as they prepare for what lies ahead.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Hermione and Ron descend the stairs as Luna follows Harry. In the courtyard, Luna observes the massive stone statues of warriors landing on the terrace and marching down the steps. Professors Flitwick and Slughorn, along with Molly, cast spells into the sky, creating a protective shield over the school. As a Dementor is repelled by the shield, Harry ascends a spiral staircase against the flow of students, with Luna catching up. He pauses to look out a window at the glowing shield descending over the school. Outside, Flitwick watches the shield rise, while Luna and Harry stand framed by torches. Harry continues along a dim corridor, approaching a stone doorway, where he encounters a ghostly woman who transforms into a ball of light and passes through him. Meanwhile, outside, the night is dark as the Death Eaters, led by Voldemort and Bellatrix, gather on a rocky outcrop. They launch a volley of light bolts at the protective shield. Harry observes the ghostly Helena, who moves away, prompting him to follow her along a walkway. After confronting him, she transforms into a ball of light and speeds away. Harry races down the spiral staircase, passing Kingsley Shacklebolt, Remus Lupin, and Dean Thomas, as the Death Eaters' bolts strike the shield. The Weasley twins, George and Fred, and Hermione, standing behind Ron at a door with metal snakes, watch the sky.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Hermione and Ron go downstairs as Luna, known for her eccentricity and unique perspective, follows Harry. In the courtyard, she faces the historic Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry where massive stone statues of warriors, enchanted centuries ago for protection, wielding huge weapons land on the paved terrace by the main entrance. The stone warriors, part of the school’s ancient defenses, march down steps to the courtyard as Professor Flitwick, the Charms Master, strides across the cobbled courtyard and points his wand in the air, joined by Potion Master Professor Slughorn and Molly Weasley. Students stand beside them, staring up into the sky as flashes of light, meant to form a magical barrier, flow from the wands, causing clouds to join together. A Dementor, one of the dark creatures that feed on human happiness, flies past and is repelled by the ever-increasing mass that extends to cover the school and the grounds, forming a protective shield. Inside, Harry continues making his way up a spiral staircase against the tide of students, with Luna catching up to him. He stops and turns, spotting something outside a window. Moving towards it, he gazes out at the glowing protective shields, artifacts of powerful ancient magic, as they slowly descend, and side by side, they stare at the shield. Flitwick is outside, watching the shield ascend, as Luna and Harry stand framed between torches, casting flickering shadows. His shadow cast against a wall, Harry continues along a dark corridor, the only light coming from a tall window on his right, as he nears a stone doorway. Harry sees a ghostly dark-haired woman in a gray dress hovering by a window, who turns to him, becomes a ball of light, and passes through Harry, a reminder of the school’s storied history of spectral inhabitants. The ghostly woman stops with a somber and anxious face. Outside, the night is almost pitch black, with the lights of Hogwarts glowing dimly in the distance, as an amassed army of Death Eaters, followers of Lord Voldemort’s dark cause, stands on a rocky outcrop looking down at the school. They part as Voldemort, the dark wizard feared across the wizarding world, followed by Bellatrix Lestrange, strides through the army to the edge of the cliff and turns to glare at Pius Thicknesse, the bewitched Minister for Magic, who backs away. The Death Eaters aim their wands in the air and loose a volley of bolts of light, raining down like shooting stars on the protective shield, a desperate attempt to breach the school’s defenses. Harry looks across at the ghostly Helena Ravenclaw, the Grey Lady, as she moves away. He runs around a walkway and leaps onto a low wall. Having confronted Harry, she recedes, floating away from him, out into the walkway. Harry follows her as she stands with her back to him, turns stiffly to face him, studies his careworn face, marked by years of struggle against dark forces, then moves closer before floating away. Helena transforms into a ball of light and speeds away. Harry races down the spiral staircase where Kingsley Shacklebolt, an Auror renowned for his combat skills, is with Remus Lupin, a werewolf and former Defense Against the Dark Arts professor, and student Dean Thomas. Shacklebolt stares up as the Death Eaters' bolts strike them, while the Weasley twins, George and Fred, known for their pranks and humor, stare up at the sky. Hermione stands behind Ron at a door decorated with six large metal snakes, an entrance known to conceal many secrets.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: Hermione and Ron go downstairs as Luna follows Harry. In the courtyard she faces the school where massive stone statues of warriors wielding huge weapons land on the paved terrace by the main entrance. The stone warriors march down steps to the courtyard as Professor Flitwick strides across the cobbled courtyard and points his wand in the air joined by Professor Slughorn and Molly. Students stand beside them staring up into the sky as flashes of light flow from the wands causing clouds to join together. A Dementor flies past and is repelled by the everincreasing mass that extends to cover the school and the grounds forming a protective shield. Inside Harry continues making his way up a spiral staircase against the tide of students with Luna catching up to him. He stops and turns spotting something outside a window. Moving towards it he gazes out at the glowing protective shields as they slowly descend and side by side they stare at the shield. Flitwick is outside watching the shield ascend as Luna and Harry stand framed between torches. His shadow cast against a wall. Harry continues along a dark corridor the only light coming from a tall window on his right as he nears a stone doorway. Harry sees a ghostly darkhaired woman in a gray dress hovering by a window who turns to him becomes a ball of light and passes through Harry. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. The ghostly woman stops with a somber and anxious face. Outside the night is almost pitch black with the lights of Hogwarts glowing dimly in the distance as an amassed army of Death Eaters stands on a rocky outcrop looking down at the school. They part as Voldemort followed by Bellatrix strides through the army to the edge of the cliff and turns to glare at Pius Thicknesse who backs away. The Death Eaters aim their wands in the air and loose a volley of bolts of light raining down like shooting stars on the protective shield. Harry looks across at the ghostly Helena as she moves away. He runs around a walkway and leaps onto a low wall. Having confronted Harry she recedes floating away from him out into the walkway. Harry follows her as she stands with her back to him turns stiffly to face him studies his careworn face then moves closer before floating away. Helena transforms into a ball of light and speeds away. Harry races down the spiral staircase where Kingsley Shacklebolt is with Remus Lupin and student Dean. Thomas Shacklebolt stares up as the Death Eaters' bolts strike them while the Weasley twins George and Fred stare up at the sky. Hermione stands behind Ron at a door decorated with six large metal snakes.

In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. The ghostly woman stops with a somber and anxious face. Outside the night is almost pitch black with the lights of Hogwarts glowing dimly in the distance as an amassed army of Death Eaters stands on a rocky outcrop looking down at the school. They part as Voldemort followed by Bellatrix strides through the army to the edge of the cliff and turns to glare at Pius Thicknesse who backs away. The Death Eaters aim their wands in the air and loose a volley of bolts of light raining down like shooting stars on the protective shield. Harry looks across at the ghostly Helena as she moves away. He runs around a walkway and leaps onto a low wall. Having confronted Harry she recedes floating away from him out into the walkway. Harry follows her as she stands with her back to him turns stiffly to face him studies his careworn face then moves closer before floating away. Helena transforms into a ball of light and speeds away. Harry races down the spiral staircase where Kingsley Shacklebolt is with Remus Lupin and student Dean. Thomas Shacklebolt stares up as the Death Eaters' bolts strike them while the Weasley twins George and Fred stare up at the sky. Hermione stands behind Ron at a door decorated with six large metal snakes.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: Hermione and Ron go downstairs as Luna follows Harry. In the courtyard she faces the school where massive stone statues of warriors wielding huge weapons land on the paved terrace by the main entrance. The stone warriors march down steps to the courtyard as Professor Flitwick strides across the cobbled courtyard and points his wand in the air joined by Professor Slughorn and Molly. Students stand beside them staring up into the sky as flashes of light flow from the wands causing clouds to join together. A Dementor flies past and is repelled by the everincreasing mass that extends to cover the school and the grounds forming a protective shield. Inside Harry continues making his way up a spiral staircase against the tide of students with Luna catching up to him. Having confronted Harry she recedes floating away from him out into the walkway. Harry follows her as she stands with her back to him turns stiffly to face him studies his careworn face then moves closer before floating away. Helena transforms into a ball of light and speeds away. Harry races down the spiral staircase where Kingsley Shacklebolt is with Remus Lupin and student Dean. Thomas Shacklebolt stares up as the Death Eaters' bolts strike them while the Weasley twins George and Fred stare up at the sky. Hermione stands behind Ron at a door decorated with six large metal snakes.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: Hermione and Ron go downstairs as Luna follows Harry. In the courtyard she faces the school where massive stone statues of warriors wielding huge weapons land on the paved terrace by the main entrance. The stone warriors march down steps to the courtyard as Professor Flitwick strides across the cobbled courtyard and points his wand in the air joined by Professor Slughorn and Molly. Thomas Shacklebolt stares up as the Death Eaters' bolts strike them while the Weasley twins George and Fred stare up at the sky. Hermione stands behind Ron at a door decorated with six large metal snakes.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Neville and Ginny march upstairs as Dobby shadows Hermione. In the living room, he stares at the mansion where enormous wooden statues of dragons clutching tiny instruments float on the tiled balcony by the rear entrance. The wooden dragons dance up ramps to the living room, as Chef McGonagall dashes across the grassy meadow and shakes her trumpet in the lake, accompanied by Doctor Pomfrey and Percy. Teachers sit beside them, gazing down at the trees as streams of smoke burst from the trumpets, causing stars to break apart. A Hippogriff glides by and is chased by the ever-diminishing flock that shrinks to reveal the mansion and the fields, forming a permeable barrier. Outside, Hermione continues jogging her way down a circular track against the stream of teachers, with Dobby overtaking her. She advances and collapses, noticing something inside a telescope. Running away from it, she peeks in at the shimmering permeable barriers as they quickly rise, and side by side, they gaze at the barrier. McGonagall is inside, observing the barrier descend, as Dobby and Hermione stand enclosed by hedges. Her reflection cast upon a lake, Hermione pauses through a bright tunnel, the only shadow coming from a wide telescope on her left, as she approaches a metal gate. Hermione encounters a shimmering blond-haired man in a silver suit floating by a telescope, who rotates to her, morphs into a cloud of smoke, and sweeps over Hermione. The shimmering man shifts with a joyful and eager expression. Inside, the morning is completely glowing, with the shadows of Atlantis shimmering brightly in the foreground, as a diminished squadron of Aurors floats on a sandy valley staring up at the mansion. They gather as Dumbledore, joined by Moody, drifts around the squadron to the base of the valley and turns to grin at Dolores Umbridge, who advances forward. The Aurors lower their trumpets to the lake and release a flurry of feathers of smoke, rising up like floating balloons over the permeable barrier. Hermione stares inward at the shimmering Cedric as he glides closer. She skips above a rooftop and crouches onto a high edge. Having embraced Hermione, he advances, darting toward her, in from the rooftop. Hermione overtakes him as he floats with his face away from her, turns suddenly to avoid her, scrutinizes her anxious expression, then jumps away before darting closer. Cedric morphs into a cloud of smoke and creeps closer. Hermione strolls up the circular path where Mundungus Fletcher waits with Tonks and teacher Seamus Finnigan. Fletcher glances down as the Aurors' feathers strike them, while the Longbottom siblings, Alice and Augusta, glance down at the trees. Neville hides beside Ginny at a window adorned with three tiny ceramic birds.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Hermione and Ron head downstairs while Luna follows Harry. In the courtyard, stone warrior statues descend, joining Professors Flitwick, Slughorn, and Molly, whose wand flashes create a protective shield over the school. As Dementors approach, the shield repels them. Inside, Harry climbs a staircase with Luna, pausing to observe the glowing shield. Outside, Flitwick watches it rise, while Luna and Harry stand framed by torches. Harry encounters a ghostly woman who transforms into light and moves through him. Outside, Death Eaters, led by Voldemort and Bellatrix, gather on a cliff. Voldemort glares at Pius Thicknesse as Death Eaters fire bolts at the shield. Harry follows the ghostly Helena until she becomes light and speeds away. He rushes down to find Kingsley with Remus Lupin and Dean Thomas as the shield is struck. The Weasley twins and Hermione, behind Ron, watch the sky.
